name: Initiation Ritual
description:
Game controls:

A- move left

D- move right

W\ SPACE-   jump

S\SHIFT -roll

LMB - attack

Mouse - direction of attack

The demon of the night in the body of the Bear King takes one child from the village every month. The chief tracked him down and fought him. The battle was fierce, but the leader lost. The leader is dead, the whole village is at a loss. 

Animated rock paintings, interesting work with light, incredibly beautiful landscapes and an interesting adventure await you in our action platformer.

Digital artists, animation:

- Anjy Svech

- Vadim Proshliakov 

- Bratwetra (https://www.behance.net/bratwetrad915)

- Mikhail Tarasov

Vladislav Pavlov - programming: visual effects, audio effects, https://dearwhoever.space/

Evgeniy Ivanov - programming, game design

Max Potashev - game design, project manager

Solo - Character, design support
